sect1.title: OSD Networking Issues
sect1.para: &ceph; is a distributed storage system that depends on networks to peer with OSDs, replicate objects, recover from faults and check heartbeats. Networking issues can cause OSD latency and flapping OSDs. See for details.
Ensure that &ceph; processes and &ceph;-dependent processes are connected and listening.
